title: Vintage, shabby chic font identification
content:
Hi gang! Hoping someone can help to identify the font used here for 'Candy Bar'.

All help greatly appreciated.

Kind regards, Jon

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052913im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_340x270_4819.192046644.jpg)

Font: 

 Captain Howdy
